import React, { useState } from "react"; import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Row, Col, Card, CardBody, Button, Label } from "reactstrap"; import { AvForm, AvField, AvGroup } from "availity-reactstrap-validation"; import ApiServicesCommon from "../../../../../services/Common/ApiServicesCommon"; import { CoreServices } from "../../../../../services"; import Select from "react-select"; import Switch from "react-switch"; import Breadcrumb from "../../../../../components/Common/Breadcrumb"; import { withTranslation } from "react-i18next"; const Offsymbol = () => { return (
{" "} No
); }; const OnSymbol = () => { return (
{" "} Si
); }; const PantallaBusqueda = (props) => { const [showResults, setShowResults] = useState(false); const [dataList, setDataList] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [displayClienteModal, setDisplayClienteModal] = useState(false); return (
{props.t("Datos Generales")}
